name: Vicious Attack Llama Apocalypse
description: The world's best mass llama-slaughter roguelike-lite-ish couch co-op top-down twin-stick shooter.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit) Processor: Core i5+ Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: DX11+ with SM3 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: One that makes sounds
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
